Subordinating conjunctions are used to connect an independent
conjunctions.  Some examples are als-when, bevor-before, bis-until, damit-so that,dass-that, wenn-if/when, ob-whether, obwohl-although, nachdem-after, da-
1.  In clauses introduced by subordinating conjunctions, the conjugated verb is forced
2.  When a sentence begins with a subordinating conjunction, the main clause begins
Während Sie in Berlin sind, telefoniert Hans mit Ihnen.  While you are in Berlin, Hans
3.  If there is a separable prefix verb in a dependent clause, the prefix remains
4.  When there are two verbs in a dependent clause (such as a modal and an
Glückliches Neues Jahr! Herzlichen Glückwunsch zum Geburtstag!
das Geschäft / der der Buchladen Laden (ä)(ä)
